snippet: A confidential email shows a top Chinese insurance regulator directly asked JPMorgan Chase’s chief for a “favor” to hire a young job applicant. | Steven A. Cohen, the founder of SAC Capital Advisors, remains as elusive as ever. | Alibaba seeks...
abstract: A confidential email shows a top Chinese insurance regulator directly asked JPMorgan Chase’s chief for a “favor” to hire a young job applicant. | Steven A. Cohen, the founder of SAC Capital Advisors, remains as elusive as ever. | Alibaba seeks control of AutoNavi. | Apple gains an ally in the fight against Carl C. Icahn. | Stealth I.P.O.’s are on the rise.

headline.main: A Chinese Official's Job Plea to JPMorgan's Chief
